attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rural pubs are closing at an alarming rate and once shut are unlikely to reopen. South Norfolk District Council has produced a six point plan to help stem the tide of rural pub closures. We call upon the government to support this plan and apply the measures to the whole of the UK.

Village Pubs: -

* are often the only place where residents can meet and thereby help to forge socially sustainable communities
* reduce anti-social behaviour and social isolation by promoting mutually supportive neighbourhoods
* provide jobs in areas which may have little other employment
* provide a meeting place for local clubs and societies
* enable integration of new residents into a community
* support local charities and sports clubs
* discourage drink driving by providing a licensed premises within walking distance
* provide an outlet for locally and regionally distinctive breweries which in turn support many local businesses

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
